Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our renovated ballroom and private event space in NYC offers an exciting location in Times Square.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Our hotel features the area's largest ballroom and boasts an impressive 100,000-square-foot space.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Custom-designed theme parties, silver service and ice sculptures are available for your wedding.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Our skilled catering team can prepare kosher and international cuisine in our event space in NYC.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Marquis Events® offers total event planning solutions for weddings and social events in the city.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: As the most unique private event space in NYC, our hotel hosts an array of high-profile events.

Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: This hotel does not offer rollaway beds. All rooms have a sofa bed.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Relax comfortably on Marriott's luxurious Revive bedding atop featherbeds and fluffy pillows.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Granite counters and spa-inspired amenities are standard in our Broadway hotel's guest rooms.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Our hotel's high-tech Plug-in panels make it easy to stay connected while in New York.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Discover New York and then relax with our Broadway hotel's premium movie channels and room service.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Marriott Rewards members can enjoy the convenience of Mobile Check-In with our innovative new app.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Concierge Level guest rooms include added services, lounge access and complimentary food.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Easily book New York City tours, airport transportation and car service through New York City Experts Guest Services.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Book tickets to Broadway shows, sporting events and other entertainment near our hotel's location in Times Square.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Enjoy fine dining and spectacular cityscapes of Manhattan at The View, our hotel's revolving rooftop restaurant.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Hop-on, hop-off bus tours of NYC's best attractions, neighborhoods and places of interest.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Check out what's playing at our Marquis Theatre, located within our premier accommodations.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Unique among Javits Center hotels, we are home to NYC's most spectacular New Year's Eve party.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Experience Manhattan by sea with World Yacht Dinner Cruises.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: The newly-renovated Broadway Ballroom offers 29,000 square feet of meeting space and 10 sections.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Exceptional event menus inspire as you plan your event at our Manhattan NYC business hotel.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Located in Times Square, this business hotel in NYC offers 100,000 square feet of meeting space.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: The Westside Ballroom features 21,550 square feet of space perfect for business meetings and events.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: 4,558 square-foot Astor Ballroom is ideal for mid-sized meetings at our business hotel in NYC.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Professional meeting planners download MeetingMatrix® Certified Diagrams of our NYC Ballrooms.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: The New York Marriott Marquis brings the energy of Manhattan to your door. Located in the heart of Times Square and the Broadway theater district, this Midtown NYC hotel sparkles with updated hotel rooms and suites and six hotel restaurants and lounges.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Discover the thrills of New York City from the heart of Times Square with accommodations at the distinctive New York Marriott Marquis. Bringing the vibrant energies of Manhattan to your door, this contemporary NYC hotel with its well-designed guest rooms and suites, lavish amenities and exceptional service is an ideal choice for weekend getaways, family vacations and business travel. Located near Fifth Avenue shopping, Radio City Music Hall, the Rockefeller Center, NBC Studios, Central Park, Carnegie Hall, Lincoln Center, the UN headquarters and Madison Square Garden, the hotel puts travelers in the midst of popular NYC attractions and business destinations. With over 100,000 square feet of event space, there's no better place to host business meetings, professional conventions, wedding receptions and grand social events than inside this NYC hotel's impressive venues where Marriott's renowned service, creative on-site catering and the assistance of professional event managers are set to ensure success.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Located in the heart of Times Square our NYC hotel is steps from Toys R Us, Broadway theaters, Rockefeller Center, Madame Tussaud's Wax Museum, the M&M Store, the Disney Store and more. Our NYC hotel puts the city at your doorstep.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: This restaurant's menu includes savory flavors and exquisite spices as guests enjoy The View from the heart of Times Square. All menus are prepared with the freshest of New York ingredients for an exceptional dining experience.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Overlooking Times Square, the Broadway Lounge offers exciting dinner menus, snacks, appetizers and drinks to fit the schedule of those looking for pre- or post-theatre fare, or a vibrant atmosphere for watching the game or relaxing with friends.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Starting with a breakfast buffet and a la carte favorites and moving into fresh ground Angus beef burgers, soups, salads and more for lunch and New York modern classics served for dinner, the Crossroads serves tantalizing favorites for every appetite.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Quick and easy, the tasty favorites of Starbucks® are served all day long featuring everything from gourmet coffee and tea to pastries and quick snacks.

Restaurant.RestaurantName: Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steak House

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Del Frisco's of New York is an energetic, sprawling, three-story restaurant located in the heart of Mid-town Manhattan.

Restaurant.RestaurantName: R Lounge at Two Times Square

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Featuring breathtaking panoramic views of Times Square, Executive Chef Anthony Paris has created a Contemporary American Grill. The restaurant is the perfect location for pre and post theater dining.

Address.AddressLine: Enter through the Renaissance New York Hotel at 48th & Seventh Ave

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: BLT Steak is our interpretation of the American Steakhouse and combines bistro ambiance with steakhouse fare.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Located on New York's famed Restaurant Row in the heart of the theater district, Becco is open 7 days a week for both lunch & dinner.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: New York City landmark Deli - known for it's pastrami sandwich

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Bobby Flay developed his signature style of American cookery, marrying the flavors of southwest with his love of grilling at Mesa Grill.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Balthazar serves traditional bistro fare from breakfast through late-night supper. Opened by Keith McNally in the spring of 1997, Balthazar offers a French menu prepared by chefs de cuisine Riad Nasr and Lee Hanson.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Del Posto creates the highest quality dining experience in what is one of the greatest indoor spaces in New York City.

Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Travel northwest on LaGuardia Rd. Take a slight right toward Grand Central Pkwy. Travel 0.3 mile and take a slight left to merge onto Grand Central Pkwy. Travel 0.8 mile and take the exit onto Brooklyn Queens Expy E. Travel 1.2 miles and merge onto I-278 W. Travel 2.2 miles and take exit 35 for I-495.L.I. Expy toward Midtown Tun/Eastern L.I./Greenpoint Ave. Travel 0.5 mile and merge onto I-495 W (Partial toll road). Travel 2.6 miles and keep left at the fork and merge onto Tunnel Exit St (partial toll road). Travel 0.2 mile and turn left onto E 34th st. Travel 1.0 mile and turn right onto 8th Ave. Travel 0.6 miles and turn right onto W 46th Ave. The hotel will be on the right.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Take the Van Wyck Expressway for 0.7 miles to I-678 N. Travel 7.4 miles and take exit 12B for I-495 W/​L I Expy toward the Midtown Tunnel. Stay on I-495 W (Partial toll road) for 7.6 miles, until passing through the tunnel. Then, keep left at the fork and merge onto Tunnel Exit St (Partial toll road). Turn right onto E 34th St, travel 1.0 mile and then right onto 8th Ave. Travel 0.6 miles and turn right onto W 46th St, hotel will be on the right.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Depart toward I-78 West. Travel 1.7 miles and take ramp left for I-78 East toward New Jersey Turnpike. Travel 2.0 miles and take ramp right for I-95 North toward Exits 15e - 18e / Lincoln Tunnel. Travel 1.3 and keep left onto I-95 North / New Jersey Tpke North. After 6.4 miles, at exit 16E, take ramp right for RT-495 East toward Lincoln Tunnel. Travel 4.7 miles and take ramp left for Dyer Ave toward Uptown / Theater District / 42 St. Travel 0.1 mile and turn right onto W 40th St, After 0.2 mile, turn left onto 8th Ave. Travel 0.3 mile and then turn right onto W 46th St. Hotel will be on the left.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: Guest rooms will be completely renovated featuring handsome earth tone décor and innovative designs. Renovations will not impact guests as it will be done floor by floor, with a buffer floor in between.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: The summer 2011 renovation of the Broadway Ballroom will make the New York Marriott Marquis an even more exciting place for guests to relax, work, dine and hold meetings.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: The hotel employs over 2,000 associates from 28 countries and over 42 languages are spoken throughout the hotel. Their depth of knowledge, "Spirit to Serve" philosophy and experience are a comfort to out-of-town customers.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: With 100,000+ sq ft of event space spanning 6 consecutive floors, it can be used for one large convention or separately for smaller programs, allowing the customer to takeover his/her own individual floor. It is also the largest, full-service hotel to Ja

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: The summer 2011 renovation of the Broadway Ballroom will make the New York Marriott Marquis an even more exciting place for guests to relax, work, dine and hold meetings.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: By summer 2011, all guest rooms will offer wireless internet access and by spring 2012, all will be renovated featuring earth tone decor and innovative designs. No impact on guests because it will be done floor by floor, with a buffer floor in between.

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: The state-of-the-art, 3,500 square-foot fitness center has panoramic views of Times Square and is open 24 hours a day/7 days a week. It is the only large hotel offering both complimentary and exclusive access to hotel guests.

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: The New York Marriott Marquis boasts a reinvented lobby with two restaurants and lounges, newly renovated guest rooms, and 55 meeting rooms with over 100,000 square feet of event space. Located in the heart of Times Square and the Broadway theater district, entertainment is just around the corner.With renowned Marriott service, creative catering and a variety of unique venues, this midtown Manhattan hotel is the ideal location for your next New York City event. Our 29,000 square foot Broadway Ballroom hosts banquets of 2,400 or receptions of up to 2,800. Or, the new Liberty room is perfect for intimate gatherings of 150-175 or less. We're home to NYC's only revolving rooftop restaurant and lounge, The View, open for dinner nightly and Sunday Mimosa Brunch. In our 8th floor lobby, visit the Broadway Lounge for cocktails and snacks over Times Square; reserve for private and semi-private events of 150-1000 guests. And, try Crossroads American Kitchen & Bar for New York modern classics in a dramatic atrium setting. Restaurants are available for group events through our Restaurant Group Dining department. Guests can keep in shape on the road at our 24-hour state-of-the-art Fitness Center with all-new Life Fitness equipment. Stay connected with free Wi-Fi in our lobby and a full-service business center. The Ultimate Times Square experience. Now even better.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: "The Ultimate Times Square Experience" - The New York Marriott Marquis' signature architectural design and iconic reputation make for an unrivaled New York City experience in the most desirable location in Times Square. Whether one is visiting for business, leisure or to attend a banquet event, the hotel is a unique destination in itself -- for sightseeing, shopping and diverse dining; all of which can also be found just outside our front doors. With a strong focus on the "principle of care", we deliver spectacular service with a human touch, enabling guests to perform at optimal levels during their stay. Q1 and Q3 are typically softer times of year, whereas Q4 is peak season. With over 100,000 square feet of meeting space, the hotel is the venue for over 100 programs a month of which 93% accommodate less than 300 rooms on peak nights. Hotel is 25% group and 75% transient, with over 25% of our guests being international.

TPA_Ext_GolfClub.Name: The Golf Club at Chelsea Piers

Description.Name: Golf Description
Description.Text: The Golf Club at Chelsea Piers, Manhattan's only multi-tiered, year-round outdoor driving range, offers the unique opportunity to hit full shots, practice putting and take lessons from top golf professionals.

Description.Name: Golf Description
Description.Text: Following its opening to the highest accolades, Pound Ridge Golf Club has emerged as one of America'spremier public golf courses.
